title: Learning Analytics-Based Computing Education Improvement Simulation Course

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Provision of smartphone-accessible virtual development environments, leveraging version control systems and data-driven learning analytics tools

learning_goals: Learners can explain basic methodologies for analyzing version control system (VCS) data
Learners can diagnose individual learning patterns using coding habit visualization tools in simulation environments
Learners can improve collaboration efficiency by over 30% by identifying peers' progress using learning analytics tools during team-based assignments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
